p: Regarding mortality, higher risk was reported for patients with NCDs and modifiable risk factors (OR 1.99). The highest risk was observed in the case of CKD (OR 2.31) followed by diabetes (OR 1.69). With regard to modifiable risk factors, cases with obesity had greater risk (OR 1.42). Again, asthma was found to be a protective factor of death (OR 0.82).
